page.title: 10Leisure In Bawdeswell
page.content: In the 1985 Village Guide are listed clubs for Aerobics, Bowls, Bingo, Cubs, Trail riders, Flower arrangers, Over 60's, Football, Table Tennis, Tennis and the Women's Institute. This was formed in 1977 and has 26 members. An annual event organised by the WI is the Produce Show in which exhibits include :- Home Baking (scones cakes bread buns) Preserves (jam marmalade chutney) Horticultural Produce (fruit & veg.) Home-made wines Handicrafts, Knitting and Sewing. A Mobile Library carrying a selection from the County Council Library visits the village once a month. In 1985 some 5 acres of land was acquired to be developed for use as a playing field.
